H0.text: Which musical instrument was patented in Berlin by Freidrich Buschmann in 1822. Harmonica

H1.text: Which musical instrument was patented in Berlin by Freidrich Buschmann in 1822. Accordion

H2.text: Which musical instrument was patented in Berlin by Freidrich Buschmann in 1822. Calliope

H3.text: Which musical instrument was patented in Berlin by Freidrich Buschmann in 1822. Aeoline

A4.text: Christian Friedrich Ludwig Buschmann is often cited as the inventor of the harmonica in 1821

A5.text: Charles Wheatstone developed a mouth-organ under the name 'Aeolina' (inspired by the Aeolian harp)

A6.text: Layout of 12 Keys of Richter-tuned Diatonic Harmonica

A7.text: The instrument described is a Richter-tuned Diatonic Harmonica
